activities: Avnet, Inc. processes certain EU/EEA and Swiss personal information about customers, business partners, and suppliers, to perform contracts and pursue business interests. Avnet, Inc. also processes certain personal information about employees and candidates for employment, including on-line, off-line and manually processed data, to administer employees and human resources programs.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: All data including human resources data
recoursemech: The Panel of EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC).
